title: Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
label: Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
description: Leads financial strategy, reporting, and operations for the enterprise, responsible for financial planning, risk management, and shareholder value creation.
responsibilities: Set financial strategy and capital allocation
Oversee financial planning, budgeting, and forecasting
Ensure accurate and timely financial reporting
Manage treasury, tax, and risk functions
Support M&A and strategic initiatives
Report to board and investors
traditionalWorkflow: Review monthly close results 7-15 days after month-end
Quarterly board presentations with manual preparation (10-20 hours)
Annual budget process takes 3-6 months of team time
Cash position reviewed daily via email from treasury
React to audit findings and compliance issues
agenticWorkflow: Real-time financial dashboards show position at any moment
Board packages auto-generated in 2-4 hours
Rolling forecasts updated monthly with predictive insights
Treasury dashboard shows global cash position and optimization opportunities
Proactive alerts for compliance risks and audit readiness
painPointsAddressed: Real-time financial visibility vs 7-15 day delays
85% faster close frees team for strategic work

title: Controller
label: Controller
description: Manages accounting operations including GL, AP/AR, close process, and financial reporting, ensuring accuracy and compliance.
responsibilities: Oversee month-end and year-end close process
Manage GL, AP, AR, and close teams
Ensure GAAP/IFRS compliance
Coordinate external audits
Implement and maintain internal controls
Provide financial reports to CFO and leadership
traditionalWorkflow: Manage 7-15 day close with team working overtime
Manually review journal entries and reconciliations
Spend 20-40% of time on close coordination
React to reconciliation errors discovered at month-end
Prepare for annual audit with manual documentation gathering
agenticWorkflow: Monitor continuous close with 1-2 day cycle
Review exceptions only (automated posting and reconciliation)
Shift time to analysis and process improvement (60-70% vs 30-50%)
Real-time anomaly alerts enable same-day resolution
Audit documentation auto-maintained with complete trail
painPointsAddressed: Close time reduced to 1-2 days from 7-15

title: FP&A Manager
label: FP&A Manager
description: Leads financial planning and analysis, developing budgets, forecasts, and business insights to support strategic decision-making.
responsibilities: Lead annual budgeting and quarterly forecasting
Provide variance analysis and business insights
Support strategic planning and scenario modeling
Manage FP&A team and department budgets
Partner with business units on financial planning
Develop KPI dashboards and executive reports
traditionalWorkflow: Spend 3-6 months on annual budget cycle
Manually consolidate department budgets in Excel
Create quarterly forecasts via spreadsheet extrapolation
Spend 50-70% of time on data wrangling vs analysis
Build management reports manually in PowerPoint
agenticWorkflow: Complete budget cycle in 2-4 weeks with collaborative platform
Auto-consolidation with real-time validation
Continuous rolling forecasts with driver-based models
Spend 60-70% of time on strategic analysis
Self-service dashboards reduce manual report requests
painPointsAddressed: Budget cycle time reduced 85% (2-4 weeks vs 3-6 months)
Instant scenario modeling vs weeks of spreadsheet work
kpis: FP&A Time on Analysis vs Data

title: Treasury Manager
label: Treasury Manager
description: Manages cash, investments, debt, and financial risk, ensuring liquidity and optimizing the enterprise's financial position.
responsibilities: Monitor daily cash position across all bank accounts
Forecast cash flow and manage liquidity
Invest idle cash and manage debt
Execute FX hedging and manage currency risk
Coordinate with banks and manage banking relationships
Optimize payment timing and bank fees
traditionalWorkflow: Download bank statements daily and update spreadsheet
Manually forecast cash flows weekly
Make investment decisions reactively
Approve wire transfers via email
Review bank fees quarterly in spreadsheets
agenticWorkflow: Real-time cash position dashboard across global accounts
AI predicts cash flows with 90-95% accuracy
Auto-investment of idle cash in approved instruments
Automated payment optimization maximizes cash retention
Continuous bank fee monitoring with negotiation recommendations
kpis: Bank Fees as % of Cash Managed

title: Tax Director
label: Tax Director
description: Oversees tax strategy, compliance, and planning across income tax, sales tax, and international tax matters.
responsibilities: Develop tax strategy and planning
Ensure compliance with tax regulations (federal, state, international)
Manage tax provision and return preparation
Coordinate with external tax advisors and auditors
Identify and implement tax savings opportunities
Manage tax audits and controversies
traditionalWorkflow: Calculate tax provision manually in Excel
Outsource return preparation to external firms ($10K-$100K+ per entity)
React to tax audits with manual document gathering (10-20 days)
Identify tax credits opportunistically (50-70% capture rate)
Track sales tax compliance manually across 50 states
agenticWorkflow: Automated ASC 740 tax provision with 95-99% accuracy
Draft tax returns auto-generated from ERP data (70% time savings)
Audit responses in 2-5 days with complete automated trail
AI identifies 90%+ of available tax credits proactively
Sales tax compliance automated with real-time nexus tracking
painPointsAddressed: Audit response time reduced 70% (2-5 days vs 10-20)
